root.name: Ski-On-Neon
root.description: GeneralSki-On-Neon is the first actual game developed by Esoteric Development for the iPhone. Previously they were only known for practical applications for the app store such as clocks, calculators and one that teaches you how to tie a tie. For their first game Ski-On-Neon has been quite the hit having over 7 million downloads world wide.GameplayIt's gameplay is actually similar to Tiny Wings where you use timing to jump and land perfectly on slopes.The game is made up of several levels where you are supposed to make it to the end of a course, but the catch is there are objectives. These objectives my require the player to reach certain heights in the game or to cross gorges. The game also has simple controls, that only requires you to press the touch screen to crouch for speed and keep you grounded, while releasing allows you to jump. The games most notable feature is it's simple yet bright and colorful neon artstyle.
